biotools.summary: SparseDOSSA 2 is an upcoming software for the simulation of null and metadata-associated microbial abundance profiles. It has functionalities for a) fitting to user-provided microbial template datasets, b) synthesizing microbial abundances similar to either user-provided or pre-trained templates, and c) additionally simulating associations with sample metadata or among microbial features.
